column1: Local Foods////The food and atmosphere here make this a great spot for a nicer evening out to eat. The patio is expansive and well-decorated
column2: and the inside is comfortable as well. The menu changes with great regularity at Local Foods
column3: so you can come back and get something different nearly every other week or so. I've had both the meatloaf and a steak here and both were truly great. All in all
column4: you won't be disappointed with eating here. Everything is fresh and local! Super impressed with this place. Go!
